description: This Dart source file defines a helper class for managing a local SQLite database in a kindergarten management system. It provides schema creation for tables related to students, staff, attendance, schedules, messages, and notifications, and implements singleton access to the database instance.

classes.name: LocalDb
classes.description: A singleton class providing access to a local SQLite database with methods to initialize and retrieve the database instance, including schema creation for various app-related tables.

methods.name: instance
methods.description: Asynchronously returns a singleton instance of the local SQLite database; initializes the database and schema if it does not already exist.
